mapper.select: SELECT VIDEOINTEREST_ID, VIDEOINTEREST_VIDEO_ID, VIDEOINTEREST_INTEREST FROM HR.VIDEOINTEREST_TB WHERE VIDEOINTEREST_INTEREST= #{videoInterest_interest}
SELECT VIDEOINTEREST_ID, VIDEOINTEREST_VIDEO_ID, VIDEOINTEREST_INTEREST FROM HR.VIDEOINTEREST_TB WHERE VIDEOINTEREST_VIDEO_ID= #{videoInterest_video_id}
